root.name: clip()

example.code:
size(200, 200) noFill() imageMode(CORNER)
background(204) clip(25, 25, 125, 125) line(0, 0, width, height) line(0, height, width, 0)

root.description: Limits the rendering to the boundaries of a rectangle defined by the parameters. The boundaries are drawn based on the state of the imageMode() fuction, either CORNER, CORNERS, or CENTER.

parameter.label: x1
parameter.description: int: x coordinate of first corner of bounding box

parameter.label: y1
parameter.description: int: y coordinate of first corner of bounding box

parameter.label: x2
parameter.description: int: x coordinate of second corner of bounding box

parameter.label: y2
parameter.description: int: y coordinate of second corner of bounding box
